articles.title: Maruti Suzuki to recall over 40,000 units of Eeco in India - Times Now
articles.description: Maruti Suzuki has recalled 40,453 units of Eeco to check for a possible issue of standard symbol missing on the headlamp. This recall will affect vehicles manufactured between November 2019 and February 2020.
